issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}
  1. Open KS
  2. Go to Base UI
  3. Choose Window NavBar
  4. Choose 'Right Nav'
  5. Click back button

KS will then crash

Crash log shows:

Exception Type:  EXC_BAD_INSTRUCTION (SIGILL)
Exception Codes: 0x0000000000000001, 0x0000000000000000
Crashed Thread:  0  Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread







Application Specific Information:
iPhone Simulator 3.2 (193.8), iPhone OS 3.1.2 (iPhone/7D11)
objc[17661]: FREED(id): message respondsToSelector: sent to freed object=0x5167df0

This is holding me up somewhat! ;)

{html}
fields.summary: App crashes when setRightNavButton is used. Confirmed in KS

comments.body:
{html}

Oddly, this works on a device, but not on the simulator.

{html}

not valid, does not reproduce in
TiMOB sdk version: 1.7.4.v20111025165811
Studio version: 1.0.6.201110251616
OS version: OSX 10.7.2 Lion
Devices tested on: iPhone 3.1.2, 4.0.2, 5.0, IPhone Simulator 5.0, IPad Simulator 5.0
